settings.heading: Allergen Statement
settings.content:
____________________

While we strive to keep a sterile environment, we cannot guarantee that guests with allergies or serious food sensitivities (especially to nuts or seeds) may not be exposed to cross contamination. As such, please understand that Karma Baker cannot be responsible for any injury, loss or damage claimed by any guest with food allergies who consumes our food, regardless of circumstances.

settings.heading: Care Instructions
settings.content:
We ship our pies frozen via Fedex Standard Overnight service. (the cost is bult into the pie price.)

Your pie should arrive by 8pm on your chosen delivery date.

Check to be sure your pie looks good and refridgerate upon delivery. Your pie may be still frozen or just cold. It may be frozen again to serve later or kept in the fridge to defrost. Serve chilled or leave your pie out 2 hours to come to room temperature before cutting and eating.

Pies come with warming directions if you choose to eat it warm!

Pies may be refridgerated for a week or re-frozen for longer life.

settings.heading: Shipping Details
settings.content: Pies are shipped free with Fedex Overnight. The price is inlcuded in the pie. It will be send FedEx Standard Overnight for no additional cost to arrive by 8pm. Pies are shipped separately from other items. Please choose a delivery date at least 1 day before you plan to eat it.

settings.title: Quick Shipping
settings.text:
Pies ship FedEx Overnight for free. And separately from other items.

All other items ship by FedEx 2-day service starting at $16.95 flat for the first item. $5 for each additional 5lbs after that.

Please choose your delivery date 1 day before you plan to eat!

settings.title: How to Store & Eat
settings.text:
Pies may be eaten cold or warmed in the oven.

Keep pies refrigerated or frozen. Frozen pies can be defrosted
overnight in the fridge. To reheat, bake at 350Â°F for 20
minutes.

Store pies in the fridge for 10 days or you can freeze them for longer life.
